com.teamname.tutortrader

Class MethodsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamname.tutortrader.MethodsController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddSessionActivity, AvailableSessionsActivity, BidOnSessionActivity, CreateProfileActivity, CurrentBidsActivity, EditProfileActivity, EditSessionActivity, MyProfileActivity, MySessionsActivity, UpcomingSessionsActivity, ViewBidsActivity, ViewImageActivity, ViewOneSessionActivity, ViewOneUpcomingSession

    public class MethodsController
extends java.lang.Object
    The main controller for TutorTrader. Contains important functions that need to be used by all other activities. Also initializes the main data structures of the app.

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • saveInFile

        public void saveInFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.util.ArrayList list)
        saveinFile borrowed from lonelyTwitter. Saves a list to a local file on the device.
        Parameters:
        fileName - specifies which file we are going to save to
        list - the arraylist we are saving to the file

      • saveProfile

        public void saveProfile(Profile profile)

      • loadOffline

        public java.util.ArrayList<Session> loadOffline()
        While offline this function is called to save new sessions to a local file. Returns an arrayList of sessions that should be pushed to elastic search.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Sessions

      • loadElasticSearch

        public void loadElasticSearch()
        Loads all sessions from Elastic Search database into proper arrays.

      • loadCurrentBids

        public void loadCurrentBids()
        loadCurrentBids loads all bids from the sessions array that were made by the current user.

      • verifyLogin

        public void verifyLogin()
        Checks if the user is logged in. An alert give them the option to go back to available sessions or Log in, calling the MyProfile to create a profile

      • updateElasticSearchSession

        protected void updateElasticSearchSession(Session session)
        updateElasticSearchSession will update a given session if information was added to it. It does this by removing the old session and adding the new one.
        Parameters:
        session - session object we wish to update

      • updateElasticSearchProfile

        protected void updateElasticSearchProfile(Profile profile)
        updateElasticSearchProfile will update a given profile if information was added to it. It does this by removing the old profile and adding the new one.
        Parameters:
        profile - profile object we wish to update

      • getProfile

        public static Profile getProfile(java.util.UUID uuid)
        get profile will return a profile object from elastic search if you pass in a profile UUID
        Parameters:
        uuid - the profile's UUID
        Returns:
        the Profile object

      • profileExists

        public static java.lang.Boolean profileExists(java.lang.String username,
                                              java.lang.String userProfile)
        profileExists will return true if a username exists in the database, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check.
        userProfile - the current user's Profile name (since we know that exists already)
        Returns:
        Boolean.

      • getSession

        public static Session getSession(java.util.UUID uuid)
        get session will return a session object from elastic search if you pass in a session UUID
        Parameters:
        uuid - the session's UUID
        Returns:
        the Session object

      • checkConnectivity

        public void checkConnectivity()
        http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5474089/how-to-check-currently-internet-connection-is-available-or-not-in-android This method will check if there is connectivity and force the user to MySession if there is no internet.

      • setConnectivity

        public void setConnectivity()
        setConnectivity will check the system for connectivity. If internet if found it will check to see if there were any sessions added while offline and then add those session to elastic search. The global variable Connectivity is set to true or false.
